links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: G.f.: (1-sqrt(1-12*x+28*x^2))/2 - _Michael Somos_, Jun 08 2000.n*a(n)=(12*n-18)*a(n-1)-28*(n-3)*a(n-2) [_Richard Choulet_, Dec 16 2009]a(n) ~ sqrt(3*sqrt(2)-2) * (2*(3+sqrt(2)))^n / (2*sqrt(14*Pi)*n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 11 2013
